name: Batch 1000 (2017)
description:
This Belgian-style Quad was our 1000th batch of beer, aged for 13th months in a Sour Mash Buffalo Trace Barrel and then tapped on the occasion of our 6th Anniversary, September 16, 2017. A limited number of bombers and a limited amount of draft is available until it’s gone.

Look for the Batch 1000 (2018) varietal from a different barrel in 2018!
